title: Episode 102 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Primary source for episode information including title, air dates, plot summary, production credits, character appearances, and trivia. Confirmed episode as filler content and documented first Poneglyph appearance in anime.

title: One Piece: Alabasta (62-135) - Episode 102
author: Toei Animation / Crunchyroll
notes: Official streaming source for episode verification and synopsis.

title: Never Watched One Piece - Episode 102 Review
author: Never Watched One Piece
notes: Detailed first-time viewer analysis providing character insights, particularly about Vivi's motivations, Zoro's philosophy, and the quality of the filler episode. Noted continuity error about Luffy hallucinating Crocodile.

title: What were those Poneglyphs from the Alabasta arc? - Stack Exchange
author: Stack Exchange Community
notes: Community discussion confirming filler status of episode and analyzing the Poneglyph's non-canon nature. Source for fan theories about the Poneglyph's purpose and Toei's intentions.

title: Believe - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for opening song information: 'Believe' by Folder5, episodes 48-115.

title: Fish - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for ending song information: 'Fish' by The Kaleidoscope, episodes 95-106. Noted that the ending is dedicated to Chopper.

title: Toei Animation/Voice Actors - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for voice actor information for both Japanese and English versions of the characters appearing in Episode 102.

title: Gomu Gomu no Mi/Techniques - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for detailed information about Gomu Gomu no Sadowari and Gomu Gomu no Zenmai, including their anime-original status and descriptions of how they work.

title: Plant and Fungi Species - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for information about the Mescal Cactus, its hallucinogenic properties, real-world mescaline connection, and various English localization names.

title: Arabasta Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for arc context and confirmation that episodes 98, 99, 101, and 102 are anime-only filler episodes during the Arabasta Arc.

title: Ruins and Lost Ways! - Japanese Voice-Over Wiki
author: Japanese Voice-Over Wiki Contributors
notes: Additional source for Japanese voice actor credits and episode information.

title: Poneglyph - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: General information about Poneglyphs in the One Piece world, used for context about the significance of this being the first Poneglyph appearance in the anime.

title: Sandora Desert - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
notes: Source for information about the Sandora Desert location, its characteristics, and hazards including the Mescal Cactus.

title: One Piece (season 4) - Wikipedia
author: Wikipedia Contributors
notes: Source for season information and episode context within the Alabasta Arc timeline.

title: One Piece (2004 TV Show) - Behind The Voice Actors
author: Behind The Voice Actors Database
notes: Additional verification source for English dub voice actor credits.
